name: unit
description: The details of units which are used to measure service capacity.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the unit object. Each unit must have a unique identifier.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The human-readable name for this unit e.g. “Bed” or “Hours”

scheme.name: scheme
scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The scheme which formalizes the unit, if applicable e.g. “SI” for Standard International Units such as Kilogram, Litre, etc.

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.title: Unit Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier of the unit taken from the scheme if applicable e.g. `kg`.

uri.name: uri
uri.title: URI
uri.description: The URI to the definition of the unit, if applicable
